dc:description: Pale buff clay with reddish-brown glaze.  Nozzle has triangular end and volutes at base which do not encroach on rim.  Right half of tip and volute restored.  Grooved rim.  On discus, gladiator, front, in pose, head seems to be turned to his right; wears helmet, tunic and greaves, rectangular shield on right arm, left arm seems to have arm guard.  Raised base ring set off by grooves.  Raised stamp H.  Ring handle with crescent attachment ornamented with groove attached to lamp but does not belong.  Right horn of crescent missing. Buff clay, red glaze.
